definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: The most commonly used patterns are highlighted in bold.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的模式用黑體突出顯示。

sentences.english: A four cone blackbody cavity was obtained by simulating the blackbody with geometric-optical method.
sentences.chinese: 用幾何光學方法模擬黑體，得一四錐黑體腔。

sentences.english: New additions to the file are shown in bold.
sentences.chinese: 這個文件中新加入的東西以黑體顯示。

sentences.english: The words suffixed with a curve are boldfaced in the printing.
sentences.chinese: 下加曲線的詞語在印刷中用黑體。

sentences.english: ISBN bold black and white skin with philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 書本的黑體字染黑白哲的皮膚。

sentences.english: How does the blackbody spectrum of the sun compare to visible light?
sentences.chinese: 和可見光對比，太陽的黑體光譜是怎樣的？

sentences.english: Carol Ann Summer and her friend Bobbie Bold came looking for military records.
sentences.chinese: 卡羅爾奧恩夏季和她的朋友博比黑體來到軍事翻看。

sentences.english: Would you change the boldface terms, perhaps using italic or underlining?
sentences.chinese: 你會改變黑體字方面，可能使用斜體或下劃線？

sentences.english: A blackbody radiator will therefore appear black in all inertial frames .
sentences.chinese: 一個輻射黑體在一切慣性系中都呈現黑色。

sentences.english: You can use boldface for headings and for words and sentences you wish to emphasize.
sentences.chinese: 你可以標題你想強調單詞的句子用黑體。

sentences.english: This article introduced one kind of high accuracy blackbody temperature measurement electric circuit.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種高精度黑體測溫電路。

sentences.english: The head-words in this dictionary are printed in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典的詞目是用黑體字排印的。

sentences.english: The sign is always a long white rectangle, with bold black letters in it.
sentences.chinese: 這種符號總是一個長長的白色矩形，內有黑體字。

sentences.english: A conical tooth light gap blackbody cavity is got by simulating a blackbody with the geometric-optical method.
sentences.chinese: 用幾何光學方法模擬黑體得一錐齒光隙黑體腔。

sentences.english: Blackbody radiation always is the result of a succession of emission and absorption processes.
sentences.chinese: 黑體輻射總是一系列發射和吸收過程的綜合結果。

sentences.english: The important words are in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 重點詞是用黑體字印刷的。

definition: Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
